html:
Jan 26 (Reuters) - A group of Amazon.com AMZN.O workers has met the requirements to hold a union election at a warehouse in Staten Island, New York, a spokeswoman for the U.S. National Labor Relations Board confirmed on Wednesday.


(Reporting by Julia Love; Editing by Leslie Adler)

(( Julia.Love@thomsonreuters.com , @byJuliaLove; 52 (55) 5282-7131; ))

Keywords: AMAZON.COM-UNION/ (URGENT)
